titles.title: Florida National Forest Land Management Act of 2003
To authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to sell or exchange certain land in the State of Florida, and for other purposes.
Florida National Forest Land Management Act of 2003

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Department Operations, Oversight, Nutrition and Forestry.
Favorable Executive Comment Received from USDA.

committee.name: House Agriculture
committee.subcommittee: Commodity Markets, Digital Assets, and Rural Development

bill.summary: Florida National Forest Land Management Act of 2003 - Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture to sell or exchange specified land in Florida. Requires the concurrence of the Secretary of the Air Force with respect to the sale or exchange of certain of such land.
